description:
Welcome to "Intro to iMovie". This course is for anyone looking to gain knowledge in video editing. imovie is super easy to use, and by the time you are finished with this course you will be well on your way to creating great movies.

Topics that will be discussed:

-Importing footage into iMovie

-Adding footage onto timeline

-Adding audio to timeline

-Adding transitions and titles to your movie

-Picture in picture

-Video enhancement

-Cropping, color correction, and various of features.

-Exporting your movie

What are you waiting for? Lets start learning!
title: Intro to iMovie - Complete Tutorial
